topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54fe6ec063687224b8250600#post_54fe6ec063687224b8250600
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54fe6e7a63687208c1f41200#post_54fe6e7a63687208c1f41200
That's what happens when you get drunk.[/bq]
It's fucking annoying is what it is.

"Okay walk a straight line"
*does it*
"Put your finger to your nose"
*does it*
"And your other"
*does it*
"Now turn four times left, 3 times right, 5 times left and then walk 19 steps then turn then walk 13 steps"
*does it*
"dohohoho look at how funny he is being able to handle their alcohol well"


I like getting drunk cause I like getting drunk, but it's annoying whenever someone has the frat boy mentality constantly watching you with their cellphone.  It's like these sorts of people get drunk to have a excuse to act like a idiot rather than actually enjoy it :\
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
I've always wondered why people stereotypically act stupid when drunk and after tonight I've learned that a lot of people use alcohol as a excuse to act stupid and people prode them on to do stupid stuff for their entertainment.


Reason why I'm getting annoyed in a nutshell:
"This alcohol tastes pretty good actually"
"Ermagod you're drunk?!  Quick do something stupid!"
"No; I'm eating dinner"
"Do something stupid!"
"No"
"Come on!  Do it for the vine!"
"No"
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

"Alcohol is the magic fuel that disconnects people from this world.":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=90eiIN9VAEo
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54fe735c6368726bb8fe3000#post_54fe735c6368726bb8fe3000
All booze does is bring out what's already there. Stupid people act stupid, aggressive people act aggressive and so on.

Now, I will say that the actual sensation of being drunk is actually really enjoyable, at least for me. Hell, not even a full on drunk. A good buzz is pretty fantastic itself.
